dublin_core.dcvalue: "Obscene Odes on the Windows of the Skull": Deconstructing the Memory of the Howl Trial of 1957

“‘Obscene Odes on the Windows of the Skull’: Deconstructing the Howl Trial of 1957” examines how the obscenity trial around Allen Ginsberg’s Howl is remembered, how that memory is constructed, whom it serves, and what it forgets.
